# serval_app_resource (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "serval_app_resource" "example_app_resource" {
  app_instance_id = "appInstanceId"
  description = "description"
  external_id = "externalId"
  name = "name"
  resource_type = "resourceType"
}
```

## Argument Reference

This resource supports the following arguments:

- `app_instance_id` (Optional) The ID of the app instance.
- `description` (Optional) A description of the resource.
- `external_id` (Optional) The external ID of the resource.
- `name` (Optional) The name of the resource.
- `resource_type` (Optional) The type of the resource.

## Attribute Reference

This resource exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

- `id` (String) The ID of the resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import serval_app_resource.example '<id>'
```
